trans-unit.source: Saves a specified single or multiple icon (HICON) to the specified icon (.ico) file

seg-source.mrk: Saves a specified single or multiple icon (HICON) to the specified icon (.ico) file

target.mrk: Saves a specified single or multiple icon (HICON) to the specified icon (.ico) file

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: The name of the .ico file in which to save the icon.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the .ico file in which to save the icon.

target.mrk: The name of the .ico file in which to save the icon.

trans-unit.source: Handle to the icon or array of the icon handles to be save.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the icon or array of the icon handles to be save.

target.mrk: Handle to the icon or array of the icon handles to be save.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether to use PNG compression for the 32 bits-per-pixel icons if its size exceed or

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
Specifies whether to use PNG compression for the 32 bits-per-pixel icons if its size exceed or

target.mrk: [optional]
Specifies whether to use PNG compression for the 32 bits-per-pixel icons if its size exceed or

trans-unit.source: equal to 256x256 pixels (262144 bytes), valid values:

seg-source.mrk: equal to 256x256 pixels (262144 bytes), valid values:

target.mrk: equal to 256x256 pixels (262144 bytes), valid values:

trans-unit.source: True - The icon will be saved as a PNG image.

seg-source.mrk: True - The icon will be saved as a PNG image.

target.mrk: True - The icon will be saved as a PNG image.

trans-unit.source: False - The icon will be saved directly (Default).

seg-source.mrk: False - The icon will be saved directly (Default).

target.mrk: False - The icon will be saved directly (Default).

trans-unit.source: [optional] The index of array to start saving at.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The index of array to start saving at.

target.mrk: [optional]
The index of array to start saving at.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The index of array to stop saving at.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The index of array to stop saving at.

target.mrk: [optional]
The index of array to stop saving at.

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: This function works with 16, 24, and 32 bits-per-pixel icons. Since the icon handles always contains a device-depended

seg-source.mrk: This function works with 16, 24, and 32 bits-per-pixel icons.
Since the icon handles always contains a device-depended

target.mrk: This function works with 16, 24, and 32 bits-per-pixel icons.
Since the icon handles always contains a device-depended

trans-unit.source: XOR bitmap (DDB), the resulting image that saved in .ico file may differ from the source image.

seg-source.mrk: XOR bitmap (DDB), the resulting image that saved in .ico file may differ from the source image.

target.mrk: XOR bitmap (DDB), the resulting image that saved in .ico file may differ from the source image.

trans-unit.source: If the specified icon is a 32 bits-per-pixel icon, and uses the AND bitmask bitmap instead of alpha channel,

seg-source.mrk: If the specified icon is a 32 bits-per-pixel icon, and uses the AND bitmask bitmap instead of alpha channel,

target.mrk: If the specified icon is a 32 bits-per-pixel icon, and uses the AND bitmask bitmap instead of alpha channel,

trans-unit.source: it will be converted to an icon with alpha channel (RGB + Alpha).

seg-source.mrk: it will be converted to an icon with alpha channel (RGB + Alpha).

target.mrk: it will be converted to an icon with alpha channel (RGB + Alpha).

trans-unit.source: Note that the icons with PNG compression are supported starting only with Windows Vista. In addition,

seg-source.mrk: Note that the icons with PNG compression are supported starting only with Windows Vista.
In addition,

target.mrk: Note that the icons with PNG compression are supported starting only with Windows Vista.
In addition,

trans-unit.source: not all applications can work with such icons.

seg-source.mrk: not all applications can work with such icons.

target.mrk: not all applications can work with such icons.
